name: I Am Freyja
description:
After time spent being the Goddess of Love, Fertility, Beauty, and other lame things, Freyja is ready to prove herself worthy as the Goddess of War. 

Bad luck that there isn't much war going on. 

Maybe killing a few skeletons will turn some heads?

Made in a time limit for Historically Accurate Game Jam 4, play as Freyja cleaning up some low level skeletons and talk with the other citizens of Asgard. 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact/Talk

Space - Heavy Attack

C - Knockback Attack (good for clearing enemies)

F - Hold to block attacks

ESC - To quit the game.
